entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
